title: spec: nil != nil when returning a *struct that is assigned to a variable typed as an interface
body:
Hi. I seem to have a nonsensical case of a function returning nil, and when the calling function imediately checks if nil, the value isn't seen as nil.

This happens on my local install of Go 1.4 (amd64/linux) and on the official Go playground.

Small example here:
http://play.golang.org/p/kjusRx4MqQ

I can get rid of the error by setting the variables type to *Structy, but this still seems like a bug.

Cheers,
Andy
